tool.name: Absolute Solvation Free Energy
tool.description: Absolute solvation free energy simulations using Yank
tool.command: ln -s '$yank_inp' ./yank_input.yaml && ln -s '$ligin' ./ligand.mol2 && #if $input_fep == 'perform': yank script --yaml=yank_input.yaml &>> '$report' && tar cf experiments.tar experiments/ #end if #if $input_fep == 'generate': mkdir -p input_files && cp ./yank_input.yaml input_files/ && cp ./ligand.mol2 input_files/ && tar cf input_files.tar input_files/ #end if

configfiles.configfile:
options: platform: $platform minimize: yes verbose: yes output_dir: . resume_setup: yes resume_simulation: yes default_number_of_iterations: $iter temperature: $temperature *kelvin #if '$ensemble' == "npt": pressure: $ensemble.pressure *atmosphere #end if #if '$ensemble' == "nvt": pressure: null #end if
molecules: ligand: filepath: ligand.mol2 antechamber: charge_method: bcc leap: parameters: [leaprc.gaff2]
solvents: water: nonbonded_method: PME nonbonded_cutoff: 11*angstroms switch_distance: 10*angstroms ewald_error_tolerance: 1.0e-5 clearance: 14*angstroms solvent_model: tip4pew leap: parameters: [leaprc.water.$water] vacuum: nonbonded_method: NoCutoff
systems: hydration-system: solute: ligand solvent1: water solvent2: vacuum leap: parameters: [leaprc.$lig_ff, leaprc.protein.ff14SB, leaprc.water.$water]
mcmc_moves: langevin: type: LangevinSplittingDynamicsMove timestep: 2.0*femtosecond splitting: 'V R O R V' n_steps: $steps reassign_velocities: no n_restart_attempts: 6 samplers: sams: type: SAMSSampler mcmc_moves: langevin state_update_scheme: global-jump gamma0: 10.0 flatness_threshold: 10.0 number_of_iterations: 1000
protocols: hydration-protocol: solvent1: alchemical_path: lambda_electrostatics: [$coul] lambda_sterics: [$steric] solvent2: alchemical_path: lambda_electrostatics: [$coul] lambda_sterics: [$steric]
experiments: system: hydration-system protocol: hydration-protocol

param.name: coul
param.label: Lambda electrostatics
param.help: Values must be between 0 and 1 and , separated.

param.name: steric
param.label: Lambda sterics
param.help: Values must be between 0 and 1 and , separated.

param.name: platform
param.label: Select the OpenMM platform used to run the calculations
